newsitem.title: CHINA: PRESS DIGEST - Chinese newspapers - Feb 24.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Chinese newspapers - Feb 24.

text.p: Following is a summary of major Chinese political and business stories in leading newspapers, prepared by Reuters in Beijing. Reuters has not checked the stories and does not guarantee their accuracy. Telephone: (8610) 6532-1921. Fax: (8610) 6532-4978.
- Banner headline reads: "Eternal glory to our beloved Comrade Deng Xiaoping."
- A frontpage report says people of all ethnic groups in China are deeply grieving and cherishing the memory of Deng Xiaoping
- One article recalls memory of Deng Xiaoping's contributions to reunification of China
- Officers and enlisted men of the People's Liberation Army say they will bear Deng's teachings in mind and rally closely round Communist Party Central Committee and party chief Jiang Zemin
- International community condoles death of Deng Xiaoping.
- A number of army generals who were with Deng Xiaoping during the revolutionary war years express sorrow at his death
- National People's Congress passes decision to revoke certain laws in Hong Kong after the handover
